DamageResistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, Slashing from non-magical weapons
Languages: Understand the languages of its creator but cannot speak

Traits.Name: Time Loop
Traits.Content: When within 30 feet of the Clockwork Morass, creatures must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw at the start of their turn or be unable to take reactions until the end of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Cogged Resilience
Traits.Content: The Clockwork Morass takes half damage from area effects, such as fireball, regardless of the source.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Clockwork Morass makes two attacks with Clockwork Smite.

Actions.Name: Clockwork Smite
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. The target's speed is reduced by half until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Temporal Surge (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Clockwork Morass creates a surge of time energy around itself. All creatures within a 15 ft. radius must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, they take 18 (4d6) force damage and are stunned until the end of their next turn; on a successful save, they take half damage and are not stunned.

Actions.Name: Gears of Time (Recharge 4-6)
Actions.Content: The Clockwork Morass unleashes a barrage of whirling gears in a 20 ft. cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (4d12 + 4) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The areas affected become difficult terrain as the gears scatter across the ground.
